sys_ux_client_script.name: On search

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_2d3b3c610cbd02101e441f78953b6ad8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">693b3c6108bd02106c837a5d1d030be4</macroponent><name>On search </name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {

    const {
        searchContextConfigId,
        searchTerm
    } = event.payload;
    
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route: "search",
        fields: {
            searchContextConfigId
        },
        params: {
            searchTerm
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-26 00:27:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d3b3c610cbd02101e441f78953b6ad8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2d3b3c610cbd02101e441f78953b6ad8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 00:27:14</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
